description: This file defines a UI component called 'NotesList' using the LightningJS framework. The component displays a list of notes, manages user interactions such as selecting, adding, and deleting notes, and subscribes to note updates from a service.

classes.name: NotesList
classes.description: A LightningJS component that renders a list of notes with functionality to select, add, or delete notes, and visually responds to user interactions.

methods.name: $onTrashHover
methods.description: Handles hover state when the trash icon of a note is hovered, updating UI to indicate hover.

methods.name: $onTrashLeave
methods.description: Resets hover state for the trash icon when the cursor leaves.

methods.name: $onAddHover
methods.description: Handles hover over the add button, changing its appearance.

methods.name: $onAddLeave
methods.description: Resets hover state for the add button.

methods.name: $emitSelect
methods.description: Emits a selection event when a note is selected, updating internal state and calling a callback if provided.

methods.name: $select
methods.description: Triggers the selection of a note by its ID.

methods.name: $handleNew
methods.description: Creates a new note and selects it.

methods.name: $remove
methods.description: Removes a note after user confirmation, updating the list and selection accordingly.
